Jan. 28, 2018 D Brass At The Guild (Preston) Contest (Championship Section)
Brass At The Guild (Preston) Contest (Championship Section) 1 Own Choice from a Specified List Brass at the Guild (Preston) brass-at-the-guild-preston-contest-championship
Own Choice from a Specified List
Odyssey [Norbury]
Guild Hall (Grand Hall), Preston, Lancashire, England, UK Test piece can be Odyssey or Contest Music (Wilfred Heaton) or The Year of the Dragon (Philip Sparke) or Concerto No 1 for Brass Band (Marcus Venables) Spring Festival Qualification: City of Bradford Best Soloist: David Karran (Cornet), City of Bradford Best Bass Section: City of Bradford Best Euphonium: Giacomo Marcocig, Longridge
Sept. 23, 2017, 11:07 a.m. Feb. 13, 2018, 5:30 p.m.

2 Thoresby Colliery Ian McElligott Odyssey [Norbury]
3 Milnrow Band Christopher Binns Odyssey [Norbury]
4 Longridge Band Mark Peacock Odyssey [Norbury]
5 Hammonds Saltaire Morgan Griffiths The Year of the Dragon
